mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS writerName, IFNULL(G.groupName,'전체') AS groupName FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN `group` AS G ON A.classId = G.id WHERE boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY A.id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{loginedMemberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, classId = #{classId}, deadLine = #{deadLine};
